document.full_text: a woman in prison 18 years for her role in a sensational 1993 kidnapping of a new york businessman who was buried alive for nearly two weeks has been granted parole, officials said on wednesday.
document.title: woman convicted in 1993 "buried-alive" kidnapping to be paroled
lines_and_colors: a woman in prison 18 years for her role in a sensational 1993 kidnapping of a new york businessman who was buried alive for nearly two weeks has been granted parole, officials said on wednesday.
